Lector:
To become a Warmaster, you need to turn to Master Auron from the Guild of Fighters in Gludin.
To become a Knight, find Sir Klaus Vasper in the central square of Gludin Village.
To become a Robber, find the Chief of the Bezik Guard near the western Gludin Gate.
To become a Magician, find Parin at the entrance to the Temple of Einhasad in Gludin.
To become a Cleric, find Zygont at the entrance to the Temple of Einhasad in Gludin.
